results.summary: A man suspected of stabbing a pregnant woman in a Birmingham car park is arrested, as police say the victim is in a critical but stable condition.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/bb816e57-ee5b-9449-8fd7-925ba0760961"><paragraph role="introduction">A man suspected of stabbing a pregnant woman in a Birmingham car park has been arrested.</paragraph><paragraph>Police were looking for Leon Harrison, 33, after the woman was knifed in the car park of Fitness First, Stirchley at about 14:00 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>The victim remains in a critical but stable condition, police said.</paragraph><paragraph>The 31-year-old, who was in the early stages of pregnancy, is understood to be known to Mr Harrison, from Kings Heath, the West Midlands force said.</paragraph><paragraph>Detectives still want to speak to the male driver of a blue Renault vehicle, who was leaving the car park in Pershore Road as the attack happened.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/bb816e57-ee5b-9449-8fd7-925ba0760961"><paragraph>A man suspected of stabbing a pregnant woman in a Birmingham car park has been arrested.</paragraph><paragraph>Police were looking for Leon Harrison, 33, after the woman was knifed in the car park of Fitness First, Stirchley at about 14:00 BST on Monday.</paragraph><paragraph>The victim remains in a critical but stable condition, police said.</paragraph><paragraph>The 31-year-old, who was in the early stages of pregnancy, is understood to be known to Mr Harrison, from Kings Heath, the West Midlands force said.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

68510562.caption: Police had released a picture of Leon Harrison, from Kings Heath, following the stabbing on Monday

items.summary: A woman is in a life-threatening condition after being stabbed several times in a car park in Birmingham.
items.headline: Stirchley stabbing: Woman attacked in car park
items.shortHeadline: Woman stabbed in city car park

items.summary: A man suspected of stabbing a pregnant woman in a Birmingham car park is named by police.
items.headline: Leon Harrison named as Stirchley pregnant woman stabbing suspect
